title: Pharma Gave Us a Vaccine in Record Time
itunes:title: Pharma Gave Us a Vaccine in Record Time
description:
At least one thing went right in 2020: Pharmaceutical companies came through. Thank you, science.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
